entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @OANN That is the reason why, Mr. President @realDonaldTrump that you should re-seat OANN at the daily White House Coronavirus Task Force briefings. OANN is sure it never stabs you in the back, like some at FOX.
